text: na unake lie apane baapon ke saamane hone mein koee dosh hai aur na apane beton, na apane bhaiyon, na apane bhateejon, na apane bhaanjo, na apane mel kee striyon aur na jinapar unhen svaamitv ka adhikaar praapt ho unake saamane hone mein. allaah ka dar rakho, nishchay hee allaah har cheez ka saakshee hai
